question.text: Which of the following statements regarding infertility is incorrect?

options.text: Infertility is the inability to produce children in spite of regular unprotected sexual intercourse.
Infertility could be present in the male or female partner or both of them.
Infertility is caused only due to physical reasons.
Assisted Reproductive Technologies can prove to be a great help for infertile couples.

solution.text: Infertility is the inability to produce children in spite of regular unprotected sexual intercourse. Infertility could be present in the male or female partner or both of them. It can be caused due to physical, congenital, immunological, and psychological reasons and even due to diseases and drugs. Assisted Reproductive Technologies like GIFT, ZIFT etc. can prove to be a great help for infertile couples.
